content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style=”stretch” video_bg_overlay=”none” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”30px” margin_bottom=”40px”][vc_column width=”1/6″ style=”default” bg_style=”stretch” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”20px” margin_bottom=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]Theme Demo Documentation Download [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style=”stretch” video_bg_overlay=”none” border_style=”solid” margin_bottom=”40px”][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text]Pinbin is a clean, minimalistic, beautiful and responsive WordPress portfolio theme. Perfect for graphic designers, web designers, photographers and anyone who likes to put their images and artworks first.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Minimalistic Design

Great looking minimalistic design from inside and out. No unnecessary details make it look clean and beautiful.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Responsive Design

Pinbin theme is optimized for mobile devices including tablets and smartphones. It adjusts to all device sizes and screen resolutions.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Lightweight Coding

This theme consists of as few files and code lines as possible. WordPress theme has never been faster and simpler than Pinbin.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Featured Images

This theme is built around the images using the WordPress built in featured images functionality.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Pinterest Inspired Design

Theme design is inspired by this popular social network which features ‘images first’.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Logo Management

You can use your own logo and we integrated WordPress media manager, so changing logos has never been easier.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_style=”stretch” video_bg_overlay=”none” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”30px” margin_bottom=”40px”][vc_column width=”1/6″ style=”default” bg_style=”stretch” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”20px” margin_bottom=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]Theme Demo Documentation Download [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″ style=”default” bg_style=”stretch” border_style=”solid” margin_top=”40px” margin_bottom=”40px”][vc_tabs style=”default”][vc_tab title=”Latest version” tab_id=”1392474733-1-589735-98e31eca-86889f77-fb02″][vc_column_text]
  • Latest version: Pinbin v1.4.7 (changelog)
  • Last updated: 01/01/2014
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][vc_tab title=”Documentation” tab_id=”1392474733-2-239735-98e31eca-86889f77-fb02″][vc_column_text]
  • Theme documentation: (click here)
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][vc_tab title=”Changelog” tab_id=”1392475136540-2-39735-98e31eca-86889f77-fb02″][vc_column_text]1.4.7 – Improved alignment for images
Improved Firefox support
Some other minor CSS tweaks

1.4.6 – Fixed issues with functions.js file.

1.4.5 – Fixed post overlapping issues for mobile devices.

1.4.4 – Updated copyright/license information

1.4.3 – Updated copyright/license information

1.4.2 – Added license information for the default image
Navigation now wrapped within div.
Improved page navigation. Now wrapped with “nav”.
Updated screenshot

1.4.1 – Added default image
Updated screenshot

1.4 – Major CSS overhaul to reduce its size.
Improved responsiveness on mobile devices (search page and post page).
Improved lists styles
Updated comments section

1.3 – Minor CSS improvements
Updated functions.php file with “wp_title()”.
Front-end scripts are now securely added using “if ( ! is_admin() )”
Theme settings page now uses “submit_button()”
Theme settings scripts are now limited to one page

1.2 – Completely rewritten functions.php. Theme now uses default WP scripts.
Improved cross-browser compatibility
Several other bug fixes and improvements.
Improved support for mobile devices with smaller screens
Translation ready

1.1 – Several bug fixes and design improvements.
Improved mobile menu and overall support for mobile devices.
New search page now displaying search term and featured images.
Updated header and header navigation.
Logo uploader now uses WordPress built-in media manager.

1.0 – Hello world![/vc_column_text][/vc_tab][/vc_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Perfect for graphic designers, web designers, photographers and anyone…
